sections.title: Student ID
Taking the photo
sections.content: Unfortunately, you'll have to go out in public for this part, unless this school lets you submit a new photo online.

sections.title: Waiting for delivery
sections.content: This is the easy part. Just wait at home until it gets there.
You'll need to get a new Student ID.

sections.title: Email
sections.content: You'll need to get a new email address.

sections.title: The System
sections.content: You'll need to get changed in The System.
